TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ResourceReader extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.IDisposable, class System.Resources.IResourceReader
Public NotInheritable Class ResourceReader Implements IResourceReader
public ref class ResourceReader sealed : System::Resources::IResourceReader
type ResourceReader = class interface IResourceReader interface IEnumerable interface IDisposable

summary.span: Enumerates the resources in a binary resources (.resources) file by reading sequential resource name/value pairs.

span.span: Enumerates the resources in a binary resources (.resources) file by reading sequential resource name/value pairs.

summary.span: **Security Note**: Calling methods in this class with untrusted data is a security risk.

span.span: **Security Note**: Calling methods in this class with untrusted data is a security risk.

summary.span: Call the methods in the class only with trusted data.

span.span: Call the methods in the class only with trusted data.

summary.span: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](https://docs.com/rick-anderson-1/8710/untrusted-data-security-risks).

span.span: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](https://docs.com/rick-anderson-1/8710/untrusted-data-security-risks).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供的標準實作介面。The class provides a standard implementation of the interface. A執行個體代表獨立.resources 檔或組件中內嵌的.resources 檔。A instance represents either a standalone .resources file or a .resources file that is embedded in an assembly. 它用來列舉.resources 檔案中的資源，並擷取其名稱/值組。It is used to enumerate the resources in a .resources file and retrieve its name/value pairs. 不同於類別，用來從.resources 檔內嵌於組件中擷取指定的具名的資源。It differs from the class, which is used to retrieve specified named resources from a .resources file that is embedded in an assembly. 類別用來擷取的資源事先已知名稱，而類別可用於擷取其數字或精確名稱不在編譯時期已知的資源。The class is used to retrieve resources whose names are known in advance, whereas the class is useful for retrieving resources whose number or precise names are not known at compile time. 比方說，應用程式可能使用的資源檔案來儲存分成區段與項目所在的區段或區段中的項目數目不事先已知道的區段中的組態資訊。For example, an application may use a resources file to store configuration information that is organized into sections and items in a section, where the number of sections or items in a section is not known in advance. 可以再以一般方式命名資源 (例如`Section1`， `Section1Item1`，`Section1Item2`等等) 以及使用抓取的物件。Resources can then be named generically (such as `Section1`, `Section1Item1`, `Section1Item2`, and so on) and retrieved by using a object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 如需有關使用類別，請參閱下列各節：For more information about using the class, see the following sections: - [具現化 ResourceReader 物件Instantiating a ResourceReader object](#instantiate) - [列舉 ResourceReader 物件的資源Enumerating a ResourceReader object's resources](#enumerate) - [藉由使用 IDictionaryEnumerator 屬性擷取資源Retrieving resources by using IDictionaryEnumerator properties](#idictionaryenumerator) - [依名稱和 GetResourceData 擷取資源Retrieving resources by name with GetResourceData](#getresourcedata) ## 具現化 ResourceReader 物件Instantiating a ResourceReader Object .Resources 檔案是文字檔或 XML.resx 檔案從已編譯的二進位檔案[Resgen.exe （資源檔產生器）](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md)。A .resources file is a binary file that has been compiled from either a text file or an XML .resx file by [Resgen.exe (Resource File Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md). A物件可代表獨立.resources 檔或已經在組件中內嵌的.resources 檔。A object can represent either a standalone .resources file or a .resources file that has been embedded in an assembly. 具現化物件讀取從獨立.resources 檔，使用類別建構函式的輸入資料流或包含的.resources 檔案名稱的字串。To instantiate a object that reads from a standalone .resources file, use the class constructor with either an input stream or a string that contains the .resources file name. 下列範例說明這兩種方法。The following example illustrates both approaches. 第一個具現化物件，代表名為的.resources 檔`Resources1.resources`使用其檔案名稱。The first instantiates a object that represents a .resources file named `Resources1.resources` by using its file name. 第二個具現化物件，代表名為的.resources 檔`Resources2.resources`使用從檔案建立的資料流。The second instantiates a object that represents a .resources file named `Resources2.resources` by using a stream created from the file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/cs/ctor1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/vb/ctor1.vb#2)] 若要建立具現化物件，表示內嵌的.resources 檔，從內嵌的.resources 檔所在的組件的物件。To create a object that represents an embedded .resources file, instantiate an object from the assembly in which the .resources file is embedded. 其方法會傳回可以傳遞至物件建構函式。Its method returns a object that can be passed to the constructor. 下列範例會具現化物件，表示內嵌的.resources 檔案。The following example instantiates a object that represents an embedded .resources file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/cs/ctor1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/vb/ctor1.vb#3)] ## 列舉 ResourceReader 物件的資源Enumerating a ResourceReader Object's Resources 若要列舉的.resources 檔案中的資源，您呼叫方法，這個方法會傳回物件。To enumerate the resources in a .resources file, you call the method, which returns an object. 您呼叫`IDictionaryEnumerator.MoveNext`方法從一個資源移動到下一步。You call the `IDictionaryEnumerator.MoveNext` method to move from one resource to the next. 方法會傳回`false`時已經列舉.resources 檔案中的所有資源。The method returns `false` when all the resources in the .resources file have been enumerated. > [!NOTE] > 雖然類別會實作介面和方法，方法不會提供實作。Although the class implements the interface and the method, the method does not provide the implementation. 相反地，方法會傳回介面的物件可存取每個資源名稱/值組。Instead, the method returns an interface object that provides access to each resource's name/value pair. 您可以擷取在兩種方法的集合中的個別資源：You can retrieve the individual resources in the collection in two ways: - 您可以逐一查看每個資源中的收集與使用擷取的資源名稱和值的屬性。You can iterate each resource in the collection and use properties to retrieve the resource name and value. 所有資源都都屬於相同的類型，或您知道每個資源的資料類型時，我們會建議這項技術。We recommend this technique when all the resources are of the same type, or you know the data type of each resource. - 您可以擷取每個資源的名稱，當您逐一查看集合並呼叫方法來擷取資源的資料。You can retrieve the name of each resource when you iterate the collection and call the method to retrieve the resource's data. 當您不知道每個資源的資料類型，或先前的方法擲回例外狀況，我們會建議這種方法。We recommend this approach when you do not know the data type of each resource or if the previous approach throws exceptions. ### 藉由使用 IDictionaryEnumerator 屬性擷取資源Retrieving Resources by Using IDictionaryEnumerator Properties 列舉資源的.resources 檔案中的第一個方法牽涉到直接擷取每個資源名稱/值組。The first method of enumerating the resources in a .resources file involves directly retrieving each resource's name/value pair. 在您呼叫後`IDictionaryEnumerator.MoveNext`從名為方法來移動每個資源，在集合中，您可以擷取資源屬性和資源資料屬性。After you call the `IDictionaryEnumerator.MoveNext` method to move to each resource in the collection, you can retrieve the resource name from the property and the resource data from the property. 下列範例示範如何使用的名稱和值的每個資源的.resources 檔案中擷取和屬性。The following example shows how to retrieve the name and value of each resource in a .resources file by using the and properties. 若要執行範例時，建立名為 ApplicationResources.txt 定義字串資源的下列文字檔案。To run the example, create the following text file named ApplicationResources.txt to define string resources. ``` Title="Contact Information" Label1="First Name:" Label2="Middle Name:" Label3="Last Name:" Label4="SSN:" Label5="Street Address:" Label6="City:" Label7="State:" Label8="Zip Code:" Label9="Home Phone:" Label10="Business Phone:" Label11="Mobile Phone:" Label12="Other Phone:" Label13="Fax:" Label14="Email Address:" Label15="Alternate Email Address:" ``` 然後，您可以將文字資源檔轉換成二進位檔名 ApplicationResources.resources 為使用下列命令：You can then convert the text resource file to a binary file named ApplicationResources.resources by using the following command: **resgen ApplicationResources.txt****resgen ApplicationResources.txt** 下列範例會接著使用類別來列舉每個獨立的二進位.resources 檔案中的資源，並以顯示索引鍵名稱和對應值。The following example then uses the class to enumerate each resource in the standalone binary .resources file and to display its key name and corresponding value. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/cs/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/vb/class1.vb#1)] 嘗試擷取資源資料從屬性可以擲回下列例外狀況：The attempt to retrieve resource data from the property can throw the following exceptions: - A如果資料不是預期的格式。A if the data is not in the expected format. - A如果找不到組件，其中包含資料所屬的類型。A if the assembly that contains the type to which the data belongs cannot be found. - A找不到如果不能是資料所屬的類型。A if the type to which the data belongs cannot be cannot be found. 一般而言，如果.resources 檔案已修改以手動方式，如果類型定義的組件不會包含與應用程式，或已被意外刪除，或組件是舊版本之前，會擲回這些例外狀況型別。Typically, these exceptions are thrown if the .resources file has been modified manually, if the assembly in which a type is defined has either not been included with an application or has been inadvertently deleted, or if the assembly is an older version that predates a type. 如果擲回其中一個這些例外狀況，您可以擷取資源列舉每個資源，然後呼叫方法，如下一節所示。If one of these exceptions is thrown, you can retrieve resources by enumerating each resource and calling the method, as the following section shows. 此方法會提供您一些有關資料相關的資訊類型嘗試傳回的屬性。This approach provides you with some information about the data type that the property attempted to return. ### 依名稱和 GetResourceData 擷取資源Retrieving Resources by Name with GetResourceData 列舉資源的.resources 檔案中的第二個方法，也需要瀏覽檔案中的資源，藉由呼叫`IDictionaryEnumerator.MoveNext`方法。The second approach to enumerating resources in a .resources file also involves navigating through the resources in the file by calling the `IDictionaryEnumerator.MoveNext` method. 每項資源，您可以擷取來自資源名稱屬性，然後傳遞至方法來擷取資源的資料。For each resource, you retrieve the resource's name from the property, which is then passed to the method to retrieve the resource's data. 這會當做位元組陣列中傳回`resourceData`引數。This is returned as a byte array in the `resourceData` argument. 這種方法是更造成不便，比擷取的資源名稱和值從和屬性，因為它會傳回形成資源值的實際位元組數。This approach is more awkward than retrieving the resource name and value from the and properties, because it returns the actual bytes that form the resource value. 不過，如果嘗試擷取資源就會擲回例外狀況，方法可協助您識別例外狀況的來源，藉由提供資源的資料類型的相關資訊。However, if the attempt to retrieve the resource throws an exception, the method can help identify the source of the exception by supplying information about the resource's data type. 如需此字串會指出資源的資料類型的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the string that indicates the resource's data type, see . 下列範例說明如何使用這種方法來擷取資源，並處理就會擲回任何例外狀況。The following example illustrates how to use this approach to retrieve resources and to handle any exceptions that are thrown. 以程式設計方式建立包含四個字串、 一個布林值、 一個整數，一個點陣圖和一個自訂的二進位.resources 檔案`DateTimeTZI`物件。It programmatically creates a binary .resources file that contains four strings, one Boolean, one integer, one bitmap, and one custom `DateTimeTZI` object. 若要執行範例時，執行下列作業：To run the example, do the following: 1. 建立名為 Library.dll 包含組件`DateTimeTZI`結構。Create an assembly named Library.dll that contains the `DateTimeTZI` structure. 以下是組件的原始程式碼。The following is the source code for the assembly. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/cs/library.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/vb/library.vb#4)] 編譯 C# 中的原始程式碼使用下列命令：Compile the source code in C# by using the following command: ``` csc /t:library library.cs ``` 或者，您也可以編譯 Visual Basic 中使用下列命令：Or, you can compile it in Visual Basic by using the following command: ``` vbc library.vb /t:library ``` 2. 編譯並執行下列的原始碼，建立名為 ContactResources.resources.resources 檔。Compile and execute the following source code, which creates a .resources file named ContactResources.resources. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/cs/createresourceex1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/vb/createresourceex1.vb#5)] 原始程式碼檔名為 CreateResources.cs。The source code file is named CreateResources.cs. 您可以編譯它在 C# 中使用下列命令：You can compile it in C# by using the following command: ``` csc CreateResources.cs /r:library.dll ``` 或者，您也可以編譯 Visual Basic 中使用下列命令：Or, you can compile it in Visual Basic by using the following command: ``` vbc CreateResources.vb /r:library.dll ``` 3. 編譯並執行下列程式碼來列舉 ContactResources.resources 檔案中的資源。Compile and run the following code to enumerate the resources in the ContactResources.resources file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/cs/readresourceex1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/vb/readresourceex1.vb#6)] 之後修改原始程式碼 (比方說，藉由故意擲回結尾`try`區塊) 或重新命名 Library.dll 組件，以便在執行階段無法使用，您可以執行範例，以瞭解如何呼叫可讓您擷取或重新建立某些資源資訊。After modifying the source code (for example, by deliberately throwing a at the end of the `try` block) or renaming the Library.dll assembly so that it is unavailable at runtime, you can run the example to see how calls to enable you to retrieve or recreate some resource information.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此物件的執行個體中使用不受信任的資料會有安全性風險。Using an instance of this object with untrusted data is a security risk. 此物件只適用於受信任的資料。Use this object only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

param.name: stream
param.span: The input stream for reading resources.

span.span: The input stream for reading resources.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified stream.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式具現化物件，擷取的資源，也就是，或是從獨立的.resources 檔或.resources 檔內嵌於組件。The constructor instantiates a object that retrieves resources either from a standalone .resources file or from a .resources file that is embedded in an assembly. 若要從獨立的.resources 檔案讀取，具現化物件，並將它傳遞給建構函式。To read from a standalone .resources file, instantiate a object and pass it to the constructor. 若要讀取內嵌的.resources 檔中，呼叫區分大小寫名稱的.resources 檔，並傳回的傳遞方法物件建構函式。To read from an embedded .resources file, call the method with the case-sensitive name of the .resources file, and pass the returned object to the constructor. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此物件的執行個體中使用不受信任的資料會有安全性風險。Using an instance of this object with untrusted data is a security risk. 此物件只適用於受信任的資料。Use this object only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation). ## Examples 本節中的範例使用下列的.txt 檔名為`PatientForm.txt`來定義應用程式所使用的資源。The example in this section uses the following .txt file named `PatientForm.txt` to define the resources used by an application. ``` Title="Top Pet Animal Clinic" Label1="Patient Number:" Label2="Pet Name:" Label3="Species:" Label4="Breed:" Label5="Date of Birth:" Label6="Age:" Label7="Owner:" Label8="Address:" Label9="Home Phone:" Label10="Work Phone:" Label11="Mobile Phone:" ``` 您可以將.txt 檔編譯至.resources 檔發出下列命令：You can compile the .txt file into a .resources file by issuing the following command: **resgen PatientForm.txt****resgen PatientForm.txt** 下列範例會假設資源檔嵌入組件，其中包含應用程式的可執行程式碼。The following example assumes that the resource file is embedded in the assembly that contains the application's executable code. 它會擷取名為`PatientForm.resources`從目前正在執行的組件，並顯示的名稱和其資源的每個值。It retrieves a resource file named `PatientForm.resources` from the currently executing assemblies and displays the name and value of each of its resources. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.ctor/cs/stream1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.ctor/vb/stream1.vb#1)] 若為 C# 範例`Example.cs`，您可以使用下列命令來編譯：If the C# example is named `Example.cs`, you can compile it by using the following command: **csc Example.cs /res:PatientForm.resources****csc Example.cs /res:PatientForm.resources** 若為 Visual Basic 範例`Example.vb`，您可以使用下列命令來編譯：If the Visual Basic example is named `Example.vb`, you can compile it by using the following command: **vbc Example.vb /res:PatientForm.resources****vbc Example.vb /res:PatientForm.resources**

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式具現化從獨立的.resources 檔擷取資源的物件。The constructor instantiates a object that retrieves resources from a standalone .resources file. 若要從內嵌的.resources 檔擷取資源，請使用建構函式。To retrieve resources from an embedded .resources file, use the constructor. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此物件的執行個體中使用不受信任的資料會有安全性風險。Using an instance of this object with untrusted data is a security risk. 此物件只適用於受信任的資料。Use this object only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation). ## Examples 本節中的範例使用下列的.txt 檔名為`PatientForm.txt`來定義應用程式所使用的資源。The example in this section uses the following .txt file named `PatientForm.txt` to define the resources used by an application. ``` Title="Top Pet Animal Clinic" Label1="Patient Number:" Label2="Pet Name:" Label3="Species:" Label4="Breed:" Label5="Date of Birth:" Label6="Age:" Label7="Owner:" Label8="Address:" Label9="Home Phone:" Label10="Work Phone:" Label11="Mobile Phone:" ``` 您可以此.txt 檔編譯至.resources 檔發出下列命令：You can compile this .txt file into a .resources file by issuing the following command: **resgen PatientForm.txt****resgen PatientForm.txt** 下列範例會列舉中的資源`PatientForm.resources`並顯示名稱和每個值。The following example enumerates the resources in `PatientForm.resources` and displays the name and value of each. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.ctor/cs/stream2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.ctor/vb/stream2.vb#2)]

summary.span: Releases all operating system resources associated with this object.

span.span: Releases all operating system resources associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以安全地呼叫多次。 can be safely called multiple times. ## Examples 下列範例中的移動檔案的資源，並顯示它找到的所有索引鍵/值組。The following example moves through a file's resources and displays all the key/value pairs it finds. 然後程式碼會使用方法來關閉並釋放它所使用的所有資源。The code then uses the method to shut down the and to release all resources used by it. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator Example/CPP/getenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator Example/CS/getenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator Example/VB/getenumerator.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您完成使用此執行個體，呼叫釋放此執行個體所使用的所有資源。When you are finished using this instance of , call to release all resources used by this instance. 您應該刪除進一步參考執行個體，讓記憶體回收行程可以回收的記憶體，而不是讓它維持在運作進行最終處理的執行個體。You should eliminate further references to this instance so that the garbage collector can reclaim the memory of the instance instead of keeping it alive for finalization. 呼叫的私用的 dispose （boolean） 方法，其中包含表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源的程式碼。 calls the private Dispose(Boolean) method, which contains the code to release managed and unmanaged resources. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: Returns an enumerator for this object.

span.span: Returns an enumerator for this object.
An enumerator for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您藉由呼叫列舉資源方法，然後再重複呼叫方法在傳回物件，直到該方法會傳回`false`。Typically, you enumerate resources by calling the method and then repeatedly calling the method on the returned object until the method returns `false`. 資源名稱是可從屬性，其值從屬性。The resource name is available from the property; its value from the property. 此範例說明如何列舉資源以這種方式。The example illustrates how to enumerate resources in this way. 實作屬性類別可能會擲回下列例外狀況：The implementation of the property by the class can throw the following exceptions: - 找不到組件，其中包含資料所屬的類型。The assembly that contains the type to which the data belongs cannot be found. - 資料不是預期的格式。The data is not in the expected format. - 找不到資料所屬的類型。The type to which the data belongs cannot be found. 您可以藉由呼叫處理例外狀況方法來擷取的資料類型與位元組陣列指派給具名資源的相關資訊。You can handle the exception by calling the method to retrieve information about the data type and the byte array assigned to the named resource. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 擷取資源的名稱與 GetResourceData 」 一節類別主題。For more information, see the "Retrieving Resources by Name with GetResourceData" section in the class topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別包含兩個方法會傳回列舉值。The class includes two methods that return enumerators. 方法會傳回介面物件，並呼叫時的建議的方法列舉資源。The method returns an interface object and is the recommended method to call when enumerating resources. ## Examples 本節中的範例使用下列的.txt 檔名為`PatientForm.txt`來定義應用程式所使用的資源。The example in this section uses the following .txt file named `PatientForm.txt` to define the resources used by an application. ``` Title="Top Pet Animal Clinic" Label1="Patient Number:" Label2="Pet Name:" Label3="Species:" Label4="Breed:" Label5="Date of Birth:" Label6="Age:" Label7="Owner:" Label8="Address:" Label9="Home Phone:" Label10="Work Phone:" Label11="Mobile Phone:" ``` 您可以將.txt 檔編譯至.resources 檔發出下列命令：You can compile the .txt file into a .resources file by issuing the following command: **resgen PatientForm.txt****resgen PatientForm.txt** 下列範例會列舉中的資源`PatientForm.resources`並顯示名稱和每個值。The following example enumerates the resources in `PatientForm.resources` and displays the name and value of each. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.ctor/cs/stream2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.ctor/vb/stream2.vb#2)]

span.span: The reader has been closed or disposed, and cannot be accessed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetResourceData (string resourceName, out string resourceType, out byte[] resourceData);
.method public hidebysig instance void GetResourceData(string resourceName, [out] string& resourceType, [out] unsigned int8[]& resourceData) cil managed
Public Sub GetResourceData (resourceName As String, ByRef resourceType As String, ByRef resourceData As Byte())

public: void GetResourceData(System::String ^ resourceName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % resourceType, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] cli::array <System::Byte> ^ % resourceData);

span.span: The name of a resource.

param.name: resourceType
param.span: When this method returns, contains a string that represents the type name of the retrieved resource.

span.span: When this method returns, contains a string that represents the type name of the retrieved resource.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.

param.name: resourceData
param.span: When this method returns, contains a byte array that is the binary representation of the retrieved type.

span.span: When this method returns, contains a byte array that is the binary representation of the retrieved type.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: Retrieves the type name and data of a named resource from an open resource file or stream.

span.span: Retrieves the type name and data of a named resource from an open resource file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會擷取為位元組陣列的具名資源的值。The method retrieves the value of a named resource as a byte array. 這通常會使用的時機屬性在嘗試擷取資源的值時，會擲回例外狀況。It is typically used when the property throws an exception when it tries to retrieve the value of a resource. `resourceType` 是代表資源的資料類型的字串。`resourceType` is a string that represents the data type of the resource. 它可以是下列值之一：It can be any of the following values: - 字串表示`ResourceTypeCode`列舉的成員，表示資源的資料類型。The string representation of a `ResourceTypeCode` enumeration member that indicates the data type of the resource. `ResourceTypeCode` 是。 若要使用的私用列舉型別表示特殊的二進位格式用來儲存 19 常見的資料類型。`ResourceTypeCode` is a private enumeration that is used by .to indicate that a special binary format is used to store one of 19 common data types. 這些包括.NET Framework 的基本資料型別 (， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， )，以及， ，和，此外，`ResourceTypeCode`列舉會包含下表中所顯示的值。These include the .NET Framework primitive data types (, , , , , , , , , , , , ), as well as , , and , In addition, the `ResourceTypeCode` enumeration includes the values shown in the following table. |ResourceTypeCode 值ResourceTypeCode value|描述Description| |----------------------------|-----------------| |`ResourceTypeCode.ByteArray`|資料為位元組陣列。The data is a byte array. 這個資料類型通常與呼叫的結果方法。This data type commonly results from the call to the method.| |`ResourceTypeCode.Null`|資料為 null 參考。The data is a null reference. 這個資料類型通常與呼叫的結果物件，其值為具有方法`null`。This data type commonly results from the call to the method with an object whose value is `null`.| |`ResourceTypeCode.Stream`|資料會儲存在資料流。The data is stored in a stream. 這個資料類型通常與呼叫的結果或方法。This data type commonly results from the call to the or method.| 假設`resourceData`已損毀，它通常可轉換從位元組陣列回其原始值藉由呼叫或方法。Assuming that `resourceData` has not been corrupted, it can usually be converted from a byte array back to its original value by calling a or method. - 字串，包含其序列化的資料指派給類型的完整的名稱`resourceData`引數 (例如， `System.String`)。A string that contains the fully qualified name of the type whose serialized data is assigned to the `resourceData` argument (for example, `System.String`). 此外，對於不屬於.NET Framework 類別庫的類型，字串包括名稱、 版本、 文化特性，以及包含該類型的組件的公開金鑰。In addition, for types that are not part of the .NET Framework class library, the string includes the name, version, culture, and public key of the assembly that contains the type. 例如，下列字串表示的序列化的資料表示的執行個體`Person`輸入`Extensions`位於名為具有任何公開金鑰並沒有指定的文化特性的公用程式組件版本 1.0 命名空間。For example, the following string indicates that the serialized data represents an instance of the `Person` type in the `Extensions` namespace, which is found in version 1.0 of an assembly named Utility that has no public key and no designated culture. `Extensions.Person, Utility, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null` 假設`resourceData`並未損毀，而且來源類型可，`resourceData`可以回到其原始值從位元組陣列轉換，藉由轉換位元組陣列並物件並將資料流傳遞至方法。Assuming that `resourceData` has not been corrupted and that the source type is available, `resourceData` can be converted from a byte array back to its original value by converting the byte array to a object and passing the stream to the method. - 用來描述中的資料類型的字串方法呼叫。The string used to describe the data type in the method call.

summary.span: Returns an enumerator for this object.

span.span: Returns an enumerator for this object.
An enumerator for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是明確介面實作。 is an explicit interface implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 列舉資源的.resources 檔案中的建議的方法是呼叫方法所傳回物件方法。The recommended approach to enumerating the resources in a .resources file is to call the method of the object returned by the method.
